This is my analysis.

```{r}
library(tidyverse) #better for data analysis and data science for basic r
df <- read_csv("Sanitation_Salvage_Truck_Violations_20250725.csv")
violation_type <- df |> group_by(Violation) |>
  summarize(count = n())
ggplot(violation_type, aes(x = count, y = reorder(Violation, count))) + 
  geom_col()
```

```{r}
df <- df |>
  mutate(time_of_day = ifelse(str_detect(`Violation Time`, "A"), "AM", "PM"))
# this creates a new column

ggplot(df, aes(y = fct_infreq(time_of_day))) + geom_bar()

ggplot(df, aes(x = fct_infreq(time_of_day))) + geom_bar()


```
